hero_title: Первый в мире ИИ-компаньон для торговли
hero_subtitle: Самый продвинутый ИИ-симулятор торговли для форекс, криптовалют и индексов. Торгуйте умнее, тренируйтесь усерднее и проходите вызовы проп-фирм с точностью.

yts_title: Let AI Do the Heavy Lifting, You Trade Smarter
yts_description: Discover How Our AI-Powered Platform Simplifies Trading for Maximum Results. FXEE's AI analyzes markets in real-time, giving you an edge in forex, crypto, and beyond.
hiw_step1_description: Create your FREE account quickly with a streamlined process—no complex KYC needed to get started. Jump straight into the action without unnecessary delays.
hiw_step2_description: Trade on FXEE's user-friendly dashboard, testing AI setups and refining strategies in a realistic virtual environment that simulates live market conditions without any financial risk.
hiw_step3_description: Unlock Prop Firm Mode to copy simulation results to funded accounts, using integrated tools to manage real trades across various prop firm platforms without leaving FXEE.
atc_description: Experience cutting-edge trading features designed for both beginners and professionals.
why_fxee_description: Discover the advantages that make FXEE the preferred choice for traders worldwide.
why_fxee_feature1_description: Advanced artificial intelligence analyzes market conditions in real-time, providing you with actionable insights and trading opportunities.
why_fxee_feature2_description: Practice your trading strategies in a safe, simulated environment before risking real capital.
why_fxee_feature3_description: Seamlessly connect with leading prop trading firms and manage funded accounts directly from our platform.
why_fxee_feature4_description: Access live market data and execute trades with institutional-grade execution speeds.
pricing_description: Select the perfect plan for your trading journey.
reviews_description: Hear from traders who have transformed their trading with FXEE.
claim_description: Join thousands of traders who are already using FXEE to improve their trading performance.
